course.subject: ELEC
course.name: Advanced Topics in AI and Healthcare
course.description: Introduction to state-of-the-art development in the broad area of AI and healthcare, including basic concepts of deep learning and advanced approaches for medical image and surgical video analysis. Students are expected to demonstrate the capability of applying fundamental deep learning approaches to various healthcare applications through hands-on homework projects.

reviews.author: Elliot_zhang
reviews.title: Great course with sufficient content and good&fair grading
reviews.comment_content: Prof. Li and the TA presented a sufficient and attractive course with multiple aspects of deep learning application in medical images, across various domains, e.g., segmentation, diagnosis and prognosis, and modalities, CT, X-ray, and WSIs.
reviews.comment_teaching: Prof. Li has a very clear English pronunciation. The TA can also communicate with clear English.
reviews.comment_grading: The grading is really fair, the TA did a very good job in rating. I put a lot of effort in the final essay, and get an A.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload is relatively light, with 3 coding assignments and 2 essays.

reviews.author: EQ14
reviews.comment_content: The instructor includes a variety of topics about deep learning and healthcare. Many guest speakers were invited to give more in-depth talks about this topic.
reviews.comment_teaching: The instructor and TA provide detailed explanations of coursework, codes, and lectures. The teaching is easy to follow. The instructor also provides hands-on examples of coding projects for students to start. The instructor also cares about what the student think of this class, and how this class can be improved.
reviews.comment_grading: The grading is nice, with adequate effort.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload includes 2 projects and one final project. Need to spend some time coding and writing reports for a nice result.

reviews.author: moonlightstar
reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment_content: The overall content is great. Prof also invited guest lecturer and also giving high level overview and explaining the depths of the content to the student patiently. The pace is also nice for us whose taking the AI in Healthcare course for the first time.
reviews.comment_teaching: Prof is teaching us and ready to interact and do question answering with student at anytime of the course.
reviews.comment_grading: Grading is nice. Prof and TA is also explaining well on things related to the grading.
reviews.comment_workload: The assignments and final project are taking so much time, but in the end it's an okay workload for me.
